ComicInfo.Summary:
Angel and the group were so fixated on the demons of their past that they forgot about the future! Well, unfortunately for them-The Blood Diamond planned ahead-far ahead! And now, everyone's favorite Zombie Tramp must learn to get with the times-fast-or be wiped out of existence altogether!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Marco Maccagni | 1 | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Marco Maccagni | 2 | C | Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Mastajwood | 3 | D | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Mastajwood | 4 | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Michael McComb | 5 | F | Risqué Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Michael McComb | 6 |
